source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot looking up at the sky through a canopy of trees. The camera is spinning rapidly, creating a dizzying, circular blur effect. The trees and sky appear to swirl around a central point.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot looking up at the sky through a canopy of trees. The camera is spinning rapidly, creating a dizzying, circular blur effect. The trees and sky appear to swirl around a central point.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides in a straight line along a city street, each maintaining a steady pace. The lead cyclist signals a turn, and the group gradually veers to the right, passing by several parked cars. As they continue, pedestrians cross the street behind them, and the cyclists slow down before coming to a stop at a traffic light.
